trans-unit.source: Additional Content Element(s) with option to display it/them in predefined layout-areas.

With the button "Create new" you can create a completely new Content-Element, while with the drop-down-field in combination with the button "Create new relation" you can reference existing Content Elements. All referenced Content Elements are shown together with the current news-article depending on the configuration. The area where the referenced content shall be shown can be chosen in the option "Layout area" above each content-element below.
